question: Which institution is to invest USD 100 million into the NIIF Fund of Funds (FoF)?
explanation:
New Development Bank (NDB), also called as the BRICS Bank, has committed to invest USD 100 million into the National Investment and Infrastructure Fund- Fund of Funds (FoF).
With this new commitment, the NIIF has secured USD 800 million in commitments. The other investors are Government of India (GoI), Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) and Asian Development Bank (ADB).
